arguments.name: c
arguments.description: The component name to migrate. If not provided, all components will be migrated.

arguments.name: a
arguments.description: Analyze and list all components that need to be migrated.

arguments.name: filter-unmapped
arguments.description: Filter analysis to show only unmapped items. Options: 'components' (unmapped components only) or 'props' (unmapped props for mapped components only).

arguments.name: project
arguments.description: Put props values usage count in this project. It is good only when you run the script with different project names.

arguments.name: deep
arguments.description: Enable deep analysis to include file information for each prop value. When enabled, adds a 'files' property containing filenames where each value is used.
